Name: primary pigmented nodular adrenocortical disease
Definition: An adrenal cortex disease characterized by small to normal sized adrenal glands containing multiple small cortical pigmented nodules.

Name: adrenal cortical hypofunction
Definition: A megacolon that is characterized by a blockage of the large intestine due to improper muscle movement in the bowel.

Name: obsolete pulmonary valve syphilitic endocarditis
Definition: A megacolon that is characterized by a blockage of the large intestine due to improper muscle movement in the bowel.

Name: adrenal gland hyperfunction
Definition: A (-)ssRNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in rodents and humans

Name: Nelson syndrome
Definition: An anxiety disorder that involves discress but neither delusions nor hallucinations.
